short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Останавливает генерацию текста в ChatGPT по нажатию Shift + Delete.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows users to stop the text generation process in ChatGPT using a simple hotkey. It is designed to improve user control by offering an easy way to interrupt long or unwanted responses during interactions with the ChatGPT model. The extension injects a script that listens for a specific key combination and pauses the generation immediately. This feature is especially useful for users who frequently interact with AI and need a quick way to manage output in real time.
